name: Stacey Reaves
text:
A wonderful company to work for - one that values employee and community. Competitive pay and benefits are offered with low employee turnover.

The products that are sold by ATV are consistently superior in quality to similar market products as demonstrated by their low warranty work rate and the health and safety of employees, clients and community always comes first and is evidenced in our safety statistics.

name: John Cutts
text:
AT&V holds a 0.0% TRIR; combined with experienced tradesmen, quality domestic materials, and aggressive schedules American Tank offers unsurpassed value.To name a few, American Tank & Vessel, Inc., designs, prefabricates, and erects on site the following:

1.  API 620 Flat Bottom Low Temperature Storage Tanks
2.  API 650 Flat Bottom Storage Tanks
3.  API 650 Pontoon and Pan Floating Roofs
4.  API 653 Tank Inspection, Repair, Alteration and Reconstruction
5.  Stacks, Silos, and Circulated Water Piping
6.  ASME Section VIII, Division I & II Field Erected Pressure Vessels
(Towers, Digesters, Columns, and Reactors)
7.  ASME Section VIII, Division I & II Spheres
8.  ASME Section VIII, Division I & II Shop Built-Up Pressure Vessels
9.  Field Repairs to ASME Section VIII, Division I & II Vessels
10.  Field Repairs to API Storage Tanks

AT&V, Inc. holds the ASME “U” and “R” stamps for Section VIII, Division I and II.
